wordpressPage.title: Hello
wordpressPage.content:
My name is SÃ©rgio, I am a Front End Developer for 5 years, altought I also know how to work with Backend and Mobile development. I normally work with HTML, CSS and Javascript, using React and its solutions such as SSR or Static Generator, depending on what I am working on. I already worked in startups, projects in big companies and now I am working remotely in an agency.

Futhermore, I have been writing in a blog for 5 years about Crohn’s Disease, after I was diagnosticated. I also recorded a few podcast’s episodes. I lived in Ireland for 7 months to study English last year and it was the craziest experience I have ever had so far.

I love cats, movies, books, specially those written by Yuval Harari, music, I play guitar and ukulele. I have a degree at IT Management and if I were follow other area it would be Genetic Engineering, it seems interesting and powerfull you be able to edit life as it was code.
